postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
DAY 1: HON GAI HARBOR -- BAI TU LONG BAY ---- CONG DO -- CAP LA ISLAND - TRA SAN ( L, D) 
 
07.45 -- 8:30: The Swan shutter bus will pick you up from your hotel and heading to northeast of Vietnam 
 
12.30: Arrive at Swan office, transferred by tender to Swan Cruise. 
 
12.45: Enjoy welcome drink, be briefing about safety on boat and activities included then check in cabin. 
 
13.30: Delicious Vietnamese set menu while leisurely cruising to the core of Halong Bay. 
 
15.00: Arrive to kayaking area -- that is Cap La Island. Enjoy kayaking through the karst and breathtaking nature, swimming and relaxing. 
 
17.30: Get back to the boat and enjoys Sunset party while our cruise sailing to the overnight anchorage. 
 
19.00: Sumptuous set-dinner onboard. 
 
20.30: Free time for joining Games, you may also try your luck with squid fishing. 
 
 
 
DAY 2: TRA SAN -- THIEN CANH SON CAVE -- HON GAI HARBOR (B, L) 
 
06.30: Starting your day with Tai Chi on the Sundeck. 
 
07.00: Breakfast will be served in Western style and furthermore with Vietnamese traditional food -- 'PHO' 
 
08.00: Explore the Thien Canh Son.  guide will explain the history of Ha Long Bay and this Cave, made by Mother Nature 
 
 09.30: Upon return to the boat you will have 30 minutes to freshen up and finish packing. Please remove all of your belongings from your cabin, you may leave heavy luggage outside of the cabin (staff will transfer directly to the pier). 
 
10.30: Vietnamese cooking demonstration on boat. 
 
11.00: Enjoy a traditional Vietnamese lunch. 
 
12.00: Disembark in Hon Gai pier 
 
12.30: Farewell Halong Bay then returns to Hanoi 
 
17.00: End of service. 
 
Attention: The itinerary is subject to change due to the weather, tide level and operating conditions without prior notice. 
 
http://www.bestpricehalongcruise.com/swan-cruise-to-bai-tu-long-bay-from-105-usd-pax.html
title: Swan Cruise to Bai Tu Long Bay: From 105 USD/ pax

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Hi, I am a university student based in Seoul, South Korea. I'm a Singaporean and I've been in Korea for 2 years now. If you are planning to visit Seoul free and easy and you need a guide to bring you around and recommend you some places, I can help you. I can also bring you to none "touristy" places if you want to experience the local life. Of course when you are travelling, u need to capture your happy moments so I can provide those service for free! I can be your personal photographer!  
A day trip from 11am to evening (it doesn't matter how late) for 50,000won. Yes, Korean won. 
Feel free to email me for any inquiry ! 
Hope to see you soon in Seoul!
title: Are you visiting SEOUL?

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Launching 27th December 2016. 
 
Time start carpooling: 7:00am onwards - office hours / special cases considered. 
Vehicle: Nissan Sylphy- 4 door saloon - corporate white and formally maintained 
 
*Total fit in saloon car is 4 passengers so each pays ($16 divide/4) = $4 per person* 
 
You may travel alone if the full fare is reasonable to you. 
 
A - If travelling to city area (Central Business District - CBD); 
* fare is $16 nett / per one way trip 
* if return trip, fare is $24 nett (pay balance $8 on return trip) 
 
B - If travelling to other areas passing through CBD and ERP, for example: Jurong (west bound via AYE); 
 
* fare is $16 nett / per one way trip 
* if return trip, fare is $24 nett (pay balance $8 on return trip) 
 
SUPER VALUE 
C - If travelling to other areas totally out of CBD; 
* fare is $12 nett / per one way trip 
* if return trip, fare is $18 nett (pay balance $6 on return trip) 
 
Payment: 
 
Cash only upon per trip completion. Official receipt can be emailed upon request for passenger business/transport claims. 
 
Contact me via WhatsApp or SMS - because most of the time I will be engaged. 
 
1- Name 
 
2- Mobile or direct contact number 
 
3- Email - for clear written communication and sending electronic invoices if required. 
 
4- Date and Frequency of carpooling required (from 27th Dec office hours) 
 
5- Special requirements and additional information. 
 
message to: +
  show contact info
title: Carpool and adhoc 24HR anywhere

Hello everyone, I am a 30+ local Chinese female in Hong Kong.Feel free to let me know if you are visitors / travelers stop by Hong Kong.I look for wider my social network and a strictly platonic friendship for a start. 
 
NO sexual or any other service should be implied. All genders are welcome. I can speak Cantonese, English and Mandarin.If you are interested, please give your self-introduction (Origin, Age, Gender, Visit dates and what are you looking for) or else no response will be given. Happy to have your picture if it is available. 
 
Interested parties, please PM me your self introduction, a recent picture and MUST GIVE YOUR LINE / SKYPE ID to allow me give an instant reply directly. 
 
Thank you.
title: Travel partner

Either it be for business or pleasure, experience the sights of beautiful Singapore with http://OpulentRides.Asia! 24 hours a day & 7 days a week, business executives & VIP guests from around the World choose Opulent Rides for their transportation needs.  
 
Our evocative & timeless 2010 Bentley 'Continental Flying Spur Speed' represents the epitome of luxury, with it's stunning Umbrian paint, comfortably seating 5 individuals with it's plush leather upholstery, air conditioned 4-zone individual climate control & impressive W12 Motor with over 600hp.  
 
You'll be greeted by one of our friendly & discreet drivers who also have extensive knowledge of Singapore & Malaysia to ensure your commute runs smoothly. *Complementary water for each passenger.* 
 
See our new website for more details: OpulentRides.Asia 
 
Available for airport/ferry terminal pick up & drop off, sightseeing tours, Malaysia trips (Insured), Corporate events, weddings, dates and anything else you can think of!  
 
Malaysia Transfer (Legoland, Hello Kitty/Little Big Club, JB hotels, Malacca, Kuala Lumpur, Genting etc) or any other part in Malaysia.
